extension.name: Digi-Komp Facebook Slider
extension.author: Chris Chaffey
extension.description:
Thank you for trying our Digi-Komp Facebook Slider. This version is Joomla 2.5 compatible.

If you like our module consider liking and following us on social media to keep up with developments.

field.name: loadCss
field.label: Use CSS File
field.description:
**Note if your unfamiliar with how css works leave this setting set as no**

If you wish to remove inline css from this module for improved SEO scores.
Set the value to yes and edit the css file provided with this module.

**If you are not going to change the style or position settings you can
use css to gain better seo scores without worrying about editing css files**

field.name: loadjQuery
field.label: Load jQuery
field.description:
**Note jQuery is required by this module.**
The only reason not to load it is if it has already been loaded by another module.

field.name: fbspeed
field.label: Slide Speed
field.description: Enter slow, medium or fast.

field.name: fbimg
field.label: Change Icon
field.description: Select the icon you would like to use.

field.name: fbimg2
field.label: Change Close Icon
field.description: Select the icon you would like to use.

field.name: fb_page_url
field.label: Facebook Page URL
field.description: Enter your Facebook page URL. Including https://

field.name: fb_page_faces
field.label: Show Faces
field.description:
Show or hide faces

**Note adjust height until it suits.**

field.name: fb_page_stream
field.label: Show Stream
field.description:
Show or hide page feed.

**Note adjust height until it suits.**

field.name: fb_page_header
field.label: Show Cover Photo
field.description:
Show or hide cover photo.

**Note adjust height until it suits.**

field.name: fb_page_link
field.label: Enter Link Text
field.description: Link text.

field.name: fb_page_width
field.label: Width
field.description:
Enter the width of the plugin.

**Note should be smaller than module width. Min width is 280 and max width is 500**

field.name: fb_page_height
field.label: Height
field.description:
Enter the height of the plugin.

**Note should be smaller than module height. Minimum height is 130.**

field.name: fbpos
field.label: Module Position
field.description:
Enter the side of the screen you want the slider on.

**Important. Icon must be opposite to module position. i.e. Module right with icon left.**

**If your using css change properties accordingly in the css file aswell as in here.**

field.name: fbdist
field.label: Distance
field.description:
Enter how far from the right or left of the screen you would like the module to sit.

**Default is 302.**

**Note exclude px from value, you can use this setting with css set to yes.**

field.name: fbtop
field.label: Top Position
field.description:
Enter how far from the top of the screen you would like the module to sit.

**Note default is 20.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbwidth
field.label: Width
field.description:
Enter the width of the module.

**Note if you change the width and add 50 then add 50 to the distance setting also. Default is 296.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbheight
field.label: Height
field.description:
Enter the height of the module.

**Note height will vary depending of layout options used. Default is 330.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbpadding_top
field.label: Padding Top
field.description:
Padding for the top of the module.

**Note default is 2.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbpadding_right
field.label: Padding Right
field.description:
Padding for the right of the module.

**Note if you add 1 to padding right then add 1 to the distance settings. Default is 2**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbpadding_bottom
field.label: Padding Bottom
field.description:
Padding for the bottom of the module.

**Note default is 2**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbpadding_left
field.label: Padding Left
field.description:
Padding for the left of the module.

**Note if you add 1 to padding left then add 1 to the distance settings. Default is 2**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbborder_width
field.label: Border Width
field.description:
Enter the border width.

**Note if you add 1 to border width then add 2 to the module distance setting and 1 to the facebook icon distance setting.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbborder_radius
field.label: Border Radius
field.description:
Enter the radius for the borders.

**Note padding will need to be added for border radius greater than 8.
Default is 5.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbborder_style
field.label: Border Style
field.description:
Enter the style of the border.

**Note choices are any valid border style attribute which include
inset, outset, groove, ridge, dashed, dotted, double and default option solid.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbborder_color
field.label: Border Colour
field.description:
Enter the border colour.

**Note it's a hex value but leave out the # . Default is 467DDB.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbbackground_color
field.label: Background Colour
field.description:
Enter the background colour.

**Note it's a hex value but leave out the # . Default is fff.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbzindex
field.label: Z-index
field.description:
This adjust how elements overlap. By default our Facebook slider overlaps our other sliders so when it slides out it sits on top of the other 2 icons.

If your changing the top positioning of our modules you will want to adjust this accordingly to avoid icons sitting over the sliders.

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fb_shadow_hor
field.label: Horizontal Box Shadow
field.description:
This sets the amount of horizontal shadow. Negative values are allowed.

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fb_shadow_ver
field.label: Vertical Box Shadow
field.description:
This sets the amount of vertical shadow. Negative values are allowed.

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fb_shadow_blur
field.label: Box Shadow Blur
field.description:
This sets the amount of blur on the box shadow.

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fb_shadow_spread
field.label: Box Shadow Spread
field.description:
This sets the amount of spread the for the box shadow.

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fb_shadow_color
field.label: Box Shadow Colour
field.description:
This sets the colour for the box shadow.

**Note it's a hex value but leave out the # . Default is ccc.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbicopos
field.label: Icon Position
field.description:
Important. Icon must be opposite to module position. i.e. Module right with icon left.

**If your using css change properties accordingly in the css file aswell as in here.**

field.name: fbicon_top
field.label: Facebook Icon Top Position
field.description:
Enter how far from the top of the screen you would like the icon to sit.

**Note this adjusts the Facebook icon position from top of module, not page.
It's 40 as default with a height of 330.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: fbicon_dist
field.label: Facebook Icon Distance
field.description:
Enter how far from the left or right of the screen you would like the icon to sit.

**Note increasing the value moves it to the left.
It's 63 as default with a width of 296 and distance of 302.**

**Not applicable if using CSS file.**

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: Module class suffix for alternate styling. **Can be blank with no value.**

field.name: give-credit
field.label: Insert Developer Link
field.description:
If you would like to include a link back to the developer set this option to show.

**Note it comes with the nofollow attribute.**
